source.name: Challenge 2
source.instructions: ### When you are finished writing your script, click the `Check It!` button to check your work.
source.guidance:
```bash
echo "Reporting for user: $USER" > introduction.txt 
echo "The home directory is $HOME" >> introduction.txt 
ls /notReally 1>output.txt 2>error.txt
sort < champs.txt > alpha-winners.txt
cat alpha-winners.txt | less
```

sequence.feedback: Be sure to redirect to the correct file using the environmental variable containing the userâ€™s name
Be sure to append to the correct file using the environmental variable containing the home directory.
Be sure to list the contents of the /notReally directory.
Be sure to redirect the standard output to the correct file.
Be sure to redirect the standard error to the correct file.
Redirect the contents of a file called champs.txt to be used as input into the command sort
Redirect the results of the input redirection into a file called alpha-winners.txt
Be sure to pipe the contents of the file through the less command.
